page.title: 11Gwynfryn - My Village
page.content: The village I live in is called Gwynfryn.It is a small village.The nearest town is Wrexham which is six miles away.The nearest villages are Bwlchgwyn and Minera.My family goes shopping mostly in Wrexham because Gwynfryn has no shops.It is important to own a car in Gwynfryn because the bus service is not very frequent. The nice things about this village are the nice view,the wild life,fresh air and the youth club,which is open once a week.The bad things about it are-no shops,the weather is cold and wet in winter and the school is far from the village.The population of Gwynfryn is about five hundred people.Most of the houses in Gwynfryn are made of stone but there are some modern houses built of brick on the outskirts of the village.
